mention.text: The shoemaker singing as he sits on his bench , the hatter singing as he stands , The wood-cutter 's song , the ploughboy 's on his way in the morning , or at noon intermission or at sundown , The delicious singing of the mother , or of the young wife at work , or of the girl sewing or washing
